title: An heart-melting exhortation together with a cordiall consolation presented in a letter from New-England to their dear countrymen of Lancashire : which may as well concern all others in these suffering times / by Richard Mather ... and William Tompson ...
author: Mather, Richard, 1596-1669.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by A.M. for I. Rothwell ...,
